hi Scott,

the default settings should not prevent your crawl
from including image files. have you added any scope
rules which may have prevented images from being
downloaded?

what evidence have you seen which indicates there
are no images? this info may also be a clue for
us to help answer your question.


/steve@...




On 4/21/09 6:43 AM, Scott Kennedy wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> I'm using 1.14.3, and I can't seem to figure out how to get Heritrix to 
> download images into the ARC files. I want to display the sites in 
> Wayback, but I'm only getting the text right now.
> 
> What settings do I need to change for it to store the images too?
> 
> Thanks
> 
>
